ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 222
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I killed a gnome necromancer in the Rathe Mountains (ok, I didn t kill it, my paladin and cleric friends did saying that necromancers deserved to die, and
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 27 Jul 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
> At 12:00 PM 7/27/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >Okey, from personal experience... "The Dead" is the name for the Dark Elf
> >Shadowknights Guild, and I believe the Eldritch Collective has something to
> >do with gnomes, though I may be wrong about that one.
>
> Affirmative - Eldritch Collective is the Gnomes Magic-Guild (includes all
> spellcasters except Necromancers)

I killed a gnome necromancer in the Rathe Mountains (ok, I
didn't kill it, my paladin and cleric friends did saying that
necromancers deserved to die, and as a bard I got hit with the
faction loss). I lost faction with "class 41."

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
